GENERAL WEATHER FORECAST FOR NEXT 36 HOURS
Issued at 04.00 p.m. on 13 October 2025
Showers or thundershowers will occur at most parts of the island after 1.00 p.m.
Fairly heavy falls above 75 mm are likely at some places in Western, Sabaragamuwa, Central,
North-western and Uva provinces and in Galle and Matara districts.
Misty conditions can be expected at some places in Central, Sabaragamuwa, Uva and North-
central provinces during the morning.
